description:
The story begins with the scenario that The Phantom is no more. In other words, the 21st Phantom was the last of the series. Kit Walker has broken the chain and has not taken up the mantle as the masked crime fighter and is now handling the day-to-day affairs of the Walkabout Foundation, an organization created by one of the previous Walkers to help support charities in Bengala, and the surrounding nations of Africa.

After a near death experience in the plane explosion and crash, Kit discovers that his wife Radhi and son Mosi are killed by the army of soldiers equipped with advanced gadgets manufactured by the terrorist organization by name Krieghund led by one Mr. Quisling. Quisling has got the army targeted at Kit and his family for his malicious intentions of taking over Walkabout Foundation. Kit decides that this is the time he takes up the role of crime fighter and avenge his family.

With the help of Jungle Patrol which is now present not just in the jungle but also in the city, he travels from Bengali to New York to find the people behind the killings. While near the Central Park he tracks down the criminal Bock who happens to be the man working alongside Quisling.

There is an explosive conclusion at the end where Kit takes the fight right to the villain Quisling during which there is destruction of entire Walkabout tower. With the destruction of foundation and his family gone, Kit Walker is truly a Ghost Who Walks and probably the Last Phantom!
name: Ghostwalk

description: The Green Lanterns' homeworld is under attack! Members of each of the Lantern Corps have laid siege to the powerful Guardians of the Universe to reclaim their stolen power rings, but only now has the Orange Lantern Larfleeze entered the fray...and he's not alone. The secret behind the stolen rings will be revealed and the status of Kyle Rayner within the Green Lantern Corps will be changed – forever!
name: Part Four

description: The trail of a missing child from a wealthy family leads Jonah Hex and Amadeus Arkham into the watery catacombs of Gotham City's still-under-construction sewer system – but will they survive the many dangers that lurk in those twisty depths? Also: introducing the Barbary Ghost, a fireworks wielding mistress of vengeance, stalking San Francisco's criminal underworld.
name: Untitled; The Barbary Ghost, Part 1

description:
First up is "The Challenge" where budget cuts to Riverdale High have the students pitching ideas on how to save the school money. With the school in financial crisis how will Betty manage to write a comedy about school life? Or is her class project the key solution?

After that, Archie attempts to beat the holiday rush in "Holiday Hassle" by getting a jump start on his Christmas shopping but will planning in advance pay off?

Finally, it's the last day of school before winter break and Ms. Beazly has whipped up a Christmas feast for the students of Riverdale but with no one to cook for at home Ms. Beazly is a regular Scrooge. Wanting to do something special for the lonely chef, Jughead will attempt to return the favor in "Now You're Cooking!
name: The Challenge / Holiday Hassle / Now You're Cooking!

description: Another rousing season of robotic basketball is underway with Riverdale facing last year's rival Tech High! Coming off an embarrassing defeat, Jughead, Dilton, and self-proclaimed brainy dweeb Roz, need a secret weapon in order to get their robots to perform to peak performance in the championship game rematch and win the title! After that, Reggie asks the new girl out but her mixed signals throw the would-be suave suitor for a loop in 'Date Debate'!
name: Bot Fever / Date Debate

description:
A century ago, paranormal investigator Edward Gray fought and destroyed a powerful warlock off the coast of the island of Saint-Sébastien. In the early 1980s, the B.P.R.D.'s newest agent was sent to retrieve the warlock's remains. But Abe Sapien is ill prepared for the dark forces that block his way. Written by Hellboy creator Mike Mignola, and featuring the haunting art of Jason Shawn Alexander (Damn Nation, The Secret, The Escapists), Abe Sapien: The Drowning is the story of Hellboy and B.P.R.D. mainstay Abe Sapien's first solo adventure.

Collects Abe Sapien: The Drowning #1-5.
name: TPB

first_appearance_teams.name: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense

team_credits.name: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense

description:
"Archie Marries Veronica" - Kevin returns from battle a war hero and the whole gang have assembled to watch him tie the knot! However it's not wedded bliss for all in attendance as the sting of separation from Veronica continues to pain Archie. Working class couple Reggie and Betty field an offer to star in a reality program showcasing their entrepreneurial nature while Dilton hatches a scheme with Mr. Lodge!

"Archie Marries Betty" - Kevin's wedding is upon us and you're on the guest list! But how exactly did Kevin meet his significant other? Discover how right in these pages... Meanwhile Archie juggles teaching responsibilities with his marriage to Betty. Don't miss out on the wedding event of the year that everyone's talking about!

A crew of uninvited monsters have invaded Riverdale, and they're close to taking over the town! Can the mysterious members of KISS stop them with some help from the Archie gang? What will they order at the Chok'lit Shoppe? Featuring guest star Sabrina, the Teenage Witch!
name: Creatures of the Night

description:
1. Revenge of the Housefly 
 
2. The Lonely Horror 
 
3. [untitled 9 page story]
name: Trick or Treat Halloween Special

person_credits.name: James Kochalka
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description:
The Little Monsters - (Bat Stew) - 1 page (untitled) (inside front cover)

The Little Monsters - A Frightful Frame-Up - 8 pages - feat. The Phantom Fright

The Little Monsters - And The Monster Army - 8 pages - feat. Dr. Yes

The Little Monsters - The Family Tree - 9 pages - feat. Uncle Horrible

The Little Monsters - Meet Goldiblob - 7 pages

The Little Monsters - (Bathtime) - 1 page (untitled) (inside back cover)

The Little Monsters - Pin-Up - 1 page (back cover)
name: A Frightful Frame-Up

description:
1. Split Phaze 
 
2. Special Laser Beam Episode (Too Much Coffee Man) 
 
3. Drawin' Comics 
 
4. The Mystery of the Misplaced Potato (Teen Squad) 
 
5. The Grid (Split Phaze) 
 
6. #2 (Freda) 
 
7. Milo the Mammal 
 
8. The Winding Road 
 
9. If the World Were Ruled by Flesh Eating Monkeys 
 
10. Quicken D 
 
11. #3 (Freda) 
 
12. King of the Mountain 
 
13. Basil's Comix
name: Too Much Coffee Man

person_credits.name: Ted Rall
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, inker, colorist, cover, other

description: The vast battle armada of the Santovasku Empire is poised to make the final assault on Earth, but Princess Kahm orders the attack called off! Along with her Earth companion Tetsuya, she prepares to return to the capital planet of the Empire to convince her father, the Emperor, to make the truce permanent. Kahm only has one way to succeed--she must marry her human consort!

With the extermination of the human race about to begin, Princess Kahm and her Earthling fiancé Tetsuya arrive at the capital of the Santovasku Empire, a palace complex covering an entire planet! Although Tetsuya is already overwhelmed by the majesty and unimaginable technology of the Santovasku, he must now act as the sole emissary of humanity as he faces Kahm's father, the all-powerful Emperor of the Santovasku!

The Emperor of the star-spanning Santovasku Empire is none too happy when his daughter, Princess Kahm, announces her marriage to an Earthling, particularly when the Santovasku intend to exterminate the human race! And when the Emperor orders the Earthman's execution, all hell breaks loose as Kahm attempts a daring rescue of her husband-to-be! Daddy will never understand!

Although Princess Kahm has saved her Earthling fiancé Tersuya from the Emperor's execution order, the star-crossed couple's troubles are only beginning! To escape the Santovasku homeworld and return to Earth, they must break through the full might of the Empire's battle fleet; and in doing so, Kahm must become a traitor to her own people!

The truce is broken! Disobeying orders, the ruthless Commander Geobaldi unleashes the full power of the Santovasku Punitive Fleet against the major cities of North America. And if that isn't enough action, Princess Kahm and Tetsuya prepare to spend their first night together! The fireworks will light up the skies!

The cities of North America have been reduced to smoking ruins by the interstellar armada of the Santovasku Empire, and Princess Kahm must return to Earth with her Earthling fiancee, Tetsuya, to prevent any further destruction. But when their ship accidentally crashes into the command vessel of the Santovasku fleet, Tetsuya finds himself locked in mortal combat with the merciless beast-man, commander Geobaldi!

A rift in the invading armada's chain of command hurls young Tetsuya into a duel with the warrior Maruda- a fight that leaves Tetsuya mortally wounded! Will even Princess Kahm's psychic healing powers be enough to pull her husband back from the brink of death? It's another dramatic highwater mark for this action-packed series!

As Tetsuya recovers from his life-threatening struggle with the beast-man Geobaldi, aid in Princess Kahm's struggle against the forces of the Santovasku Empire comes from an unexpected corner! Meanwhile, on Earth, the sorceress Jilehr faces a battle of her own- one between the two sides of her own personality! Who will win- Jilehr, possibly Earth's greatest defender, or Aki, a frightened young woman?

Princess Kahm, her Earthling fiancé Tetsuya, her friend Battia, and their new ally, the beast-man Geobaldi, propose a cease-fire to an alien-ravaged Earth. earth's leader, the mysterious Neo, agrees to their terms- but his aide-de-camp, General Togo, is determined to sabotage any peace between Kahm's rebel forces and the Earth! His plan: create a rift between the Princess and Tetsuya. His weapons: two beautiful women from Tetsuya's past!

Princess Kahm and her renegade battle fleet attempt to form an alliance with the armies of Earth so that their combined might can stand against the awesome invasion armada sent by Kahm's father, Emperor of the Santovasku. Tensions are pushed to the limit during the delicate negotiations as sworn enemies explore their one chance to stave off an interstellar genocide!

Princess Kahm's armed revolt against her father's interstellar empire takes a turn for the worse when the Emperor orders an all-out surprise assault against his daughter's rebel fleet. but aboard Kahm's own vessel lurks an even greater threat- a stowaway Earth girl bent on vengeance for her parents' death at the hands of the Santovasku! Could Kahm's alliance with Earth leave her open to assassination?

It's a face-to-face confrontation when Princess Kahm stares down her father, Emperor Quevas, and refuses to accede to his demands that she end her relationship with Tetsuya! Kahm receives some unexpected support, which results in a wedding announcement! In retaliation, Emperor Quevas sends a punitive fleet to Earth - with orders not only to crush the rebellion, but to annihilate the entire solar system!

While Princess Kahm dreams of wedded bliss, Tetsuya contemplates their plight. With the Empire's entire fleet of 8,170,000 ships bent on the annihilation of his paltry rebel fleet of 122, he has got to wonder about the sanity of their rebel plans. Of course, they do have the planet Earth on their side, not to mention the nearly limitless power of the sorceress Jilehr! But General Togo has an ace up his sleeve with "Operation Phoenix"!

Kahm and Tetsuya's wedding plans rush forward as the clock ticks down for the arrival of eight million Santovasku warships sent to obliterate the solar system. But an unknown factor is soon to be unleashed by General Togo - Operation Phoenix. Earth's moon is, in reality, a giant disguised weapons system left over from the wars that destroyed the ancestors of the Santovasku. Togo plans to activate the system and destroy the invading fleet, but his ambitions reach one step further - a galaxy ruled by Earth!

The big day has arrived! Kahn and Tetsuya are finally united in the bonds of interstellar matrimony, and the celebration of the century is launched! But just as our lovebirds are about to begin their honeymoon, they are interrupted by gatecrashers- eight million Santovasku warships bent on the annihilation of the wedding party, planet Earth, and the entire Solar System! Who's going to pay for this mess?!

The wedding party of Kahm and Tetsuya is turned into a war party as their tiny rebel fleet charges head-to-head into the vast armada of the Santovasku Empire- eight million ships whose mission is to vaporize Earth! But, there are wild cards in the deck. The spirit of Neo- sworn enemy of the Santovasku- moves beyond the grave and possesses Tetsuya's friend , Aki. And if that doesn't raise the stakes enough, the surface of the moon begins to split open as General Togo activates the gigantic weapons system hidden within!

As Princess Kahm's tiny fleet crumbles against the might of eight million Santovasku warships, rebel commander Geobaldi challenges the Santovasku Group Commander to a ship-to-ship duel. While the mighty living battleships grapple in mortal combat, aboard Kahm's vessel, Tetsuya's friend Aki is again possessed by the spirit of the all-powerful sorceress Jilehr, who take control of the rebel force. And if these developments weren't enough logs on the fire, General Togo activates the giant weapons complex that is Earth's moon and, oblivious to friend or foe, unleashes the battlestation's immeasurable firepower directly into the center of the battle!

The Santovasku invasion force and the rebel fleet have been destroyed by the massive hidden weapons complex that is Earth's moon, and only the sorcery of Jilehr saves Princess Kahm and those aboard her vessel from annihilation. A triumphant General Togo plans next to turn the moon/battlestation's limitless power against the Imperial Planet of the Empire, leaving Earth to dominate the galaxy. But before Togo can begin his dream of conquest, the control systems of the station mysteriously become inoperative. To the horror of all, the Sorceress Jilehr has taken control of the gigantic satellite, setting it on a collision course with Earth!

Spectacle so vast we needed extra pages to show it! With Earth destroyed, the Sorceress Jilehr transports the survivors of Kahm's rebel fleet to the Santovasku homeworld for a final confrontation with Kahm's father, Emperor of the Santovasku. Kahm, Tetsuya, and company must watch helplessly as Jilehr and the Emperor clash in a planet-wide fire storm of apocalyptic mystical power.

The Santovasku homeworld lies ravaged in the aftermath of a war of magic, and the Sorceress Jilehr lies dying, her duel with the Emperor ending in bitter failure. As Kahm and her band of rebels mourn their fallen ally, the triumphant Emperor projects himself aboard the rebel command vessel and spirits Kahm away. If Tetsuya leaves his princess bride forever, the Emperor will spare him and his comrades--but instead, Tetsuya leads the remnants of the rebel fleet in an all-out suicide run to the Emperor's private chambers to rescue the captured princess!

While Tetsuya frantically searches the Imperial Palace for his captive bride, Princess Kahm, the last remnants of the rebel army fight a desperate delaying action against the hordes of the Emperor's palace guard. Their backs to the wall, their blood buying time, Geobaldi and Battia face certain death as they heroically battle hand-to-hand against an endless stream of Santovasku warriors!

With the last warriors of the rebel army vanquished, only Tetsuya remains to rescue his imprisoned bride Kahm from her father, Emperor of the Santovasku. But when Tetsuya finally reaches the Emperor's chambers, he does not find a loving wife, but a transformed Kahm, brainwashed and intent on cutting Tetsuya to ribbons!

On the ravaged homeworld of the Santovasku, Earthman Tetsuya Wakatsuki lies dying, struck down by the sword of his brainwashed alien bride, Kahm. As the sight of her mortally wounded husband shatters the mind control of her father, the Santovasku Emperor, Kahm realizes she has but one chance to save Tetsuya--she must tap into the fiery energies of the planet itself and battle her father to the death!

Kahm and Tetsuya have vanquished Kahm's father, the Santovasku Emperor, but the victory is short-lived. The Emperor's death unleashes the awesome powers of the Imperial Planet in a cataclysmic eruption that threatens to trap the two lovers in the seething energies of a dying planet!

Tetsuya and Kahm have left the disintegrated Imperial Planet of the Santovasku behind them. The battle is won, but leaving a terrible cost: Geobaldi, Battia, Raisa and Kahm's father are all gone, scattered trough space along with a dying world's debris. But life goes on, and we learn the ultimate fate of two star-crossed lovers in this touching finale to the Outlanders epic.

Stryker’s back in a bad way!

Our heroes must assemble to put an end to Stryker's evil plan!

Is there a traitor amidst the new X-Men?
In a city that once seemed to be in a permanent state of war and despair, peace has reigned for a decade. What has become of the city that Matty Roth, Zee and so many others fought to preserve?
name: Epilogue

description: In these stories from issues #31-35 and HALLOWEEN ANNUAL #2, Fig learns why the Pair of Conception chased her into the House of Mystery.
name: Vol. 7

description: The space-spanning adventure from the creative team behind 100 BULLETS rolls on as our hero, Orson, drowns in a sea of star pirates, dirty drugs and his own intergalactic failures. Can he keep his head above water long enough to do the right thing?
name: Past 1,000,000

description: In ancient Mesopotamia, just after the Flood that almost ended the world, the hero-king Gilgamesh embarks on a monster-hunt – but the biggest monster may be walking at his side. A time-lost legend that casts unexpected light on the most ruthless of Tom's enemies: the man known as Pullman.
name: Set In Stone

description: Make the holiday season happier with another Gold Digger Xmas Special for you and yours! Series creator Fred Perryand your other favorite A.P. artists bring you plenty of Yuletide yarns to warm your heart when the weather outside is frightful. Be good and give (or get) a gift of Gold Digger this Christmas!
From the 1930's into the far flung future, four gnerations of heroes are sworn to protect the course of history against those who threaten to change it.
name: Captain Clockwork Chronology

description: The past has caught up with Daniel Kilgore... and the ghost of his brother is sitting this one out! Held captive in the hellhole of the Radical City of the Second Church, it will take a mysterious stranger to rescue Daniel... not only from his captors, but also from his own nightmares!
name: A Conspiracy

first_appearance_locations.name: Radical City of the Second Church

location_credits.name: Radical City of the Second Church

description:
"LOST CHILDREN," Part Three

After the horrific murder of one of Green Wake's most elusive citizens, a new organization emerges in open rebellion against the followers of Micah. While the opposing sides clash, murders continue to surface with no suspect in sight.
name: Lost Children, Part 3

description: Cassius stands alone! As sole protector of the comatose Karic, Cassius must rely on every aspect of his Templar skills to defend them both amidst the frost and fury of a raging blizzard...against a rat horde bent on vengeance! As the snow runs red with the blood of enemies, Cassius wrestles over the stunning truth of Karic's prophecy, destiny and his growing legend. The two-time Harvey Award-winning series continues, from the acclaimed writer of Thor: First Thunder and the co-creator of POWERS and Takio!
name: Part 6: Solitaire

volume.name: The Mice Templar, Volume III: A Midwinter Night's Dream

description:
"INTERDIMENSIONAL WOMEN'S PRISON BREAKOUT," Part Three

Vlad is dying! Samhain is in the clutches of the highly evil, Bomb Queen, missing a limb or two! And a lone Cassie has to take out one really psychotic mime! Things are getting ugly up in here, in the conclusion to INTERDIMENSIONAL WOMEN'S PRISON BREAKOUT. Also includes an installment of The Corpse serial "Orphans of the Air" by James Lowder and Jean-Paul Deshong.
name: Interdimensional Women's Prison Breakout, Part Three

description:
-Hydra rises from the ashes!

-What secret has Cap been keeping throughout Fear Itself?

-Alan Davis joins the all-star creative team!

In Hydra Flying Island, Baron Zemo and Queen Hydra talk about their new plans. Zemo asks Queen Hydra about the negotiations with Madame Hydra and the Gorgon, and Queen Hydra replies that they have a different agenda, so she absorbed most of her ranks. Queen Hydra asks Zemo about his new mission and he replies that in another week, he'll be finished, as long Captain America does not get in his way. Queen Hydra tells him not to worry about Captain America, saying that he will have his hands full with their new lackeys.

Meanwhile, Captain America is fighting Batroc, who gains the upper hand. Suddenly, Batroc creates copies of himself and attacks Cap, who then turns into his skinny self. It all turns out to be nightmare Steve was having. Sharon is worried, saying that ever since he defeated Codename Bravo, he has been having bad dreams. She advises him to get help, and he agrees.

Later, Iron Man and Hawkeye check on Cap using a special machine. When Iron Man asks Cap about the Super-Soldier serum's deactivation, Cap tells him about the time he fought Machinesmith in Madripoor. He says that he reverse the procedure, or so he thought. Iron Man tells him that he will cross-reference his results with Beast's notes from that mission and he will have the results by tomorrow.

As Cap and Hawkeye leave, Hawkeye tells him that everything Cap's going through is in his mind and he needs to clear his head. To do that, he suggests chasing after bad guys.

Later, Cap and Hawkeye take down a band of bank robbers, then, they go to track down the Tinkerer. Suddenly, Cap and Hawkeye recieve news from Sharon that a riot broke out forty minutes ago. Cap and Hawkeye go to the place the riot is happening and manage to save some cops from the mob. Cap believes the riot was not spontaneuos and something compelled the people to act. He asks Sharon where did the riot start, and Sharon replies that the riot started three blocks north from their current position.

Cap and Hawkeye arrive at the riot's starting place and find that the riot was caused by a Madbomb. Suddenly, Cap turns into his skinny self and Hawkeye is blasted unconscious. The Serpent Squad, the ones responsible for the Madbomb, appear and destroy the Madbomb. Although Cap tries to stop them, the Serpent Squad attacks him.

To be continued...
name: Powerless, Part 1

description: The Wheel of Time continues to turn! Rand, Thom, and Mat reach Whitebridge at last and disembark the Spray, despite Captain Domon's offer to bring them further down the river. In the city they soon find that they're not the only ones searching for Moiraine and the others... join us for the next chapter of Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time: The Eye of the World!

volume.name: Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time: The Eye of the World

description: RUN THE MISSION! DON'T GET SEEN! SAVE THE WORLD! • The Secret Avengers are all dead save for the Black Widow. The world's greatest secret agent finds herself one year in the past, on the most secret mission of all: saving her team, and saving the world, without letting anyone see her... especially her team.
name: Encircle

description:
A tale of skullduggery in the heart of deep woods of Bengali concerning the Skull Cave and the hidden secrets, valuables and treasures in there. The fate of Kit Walker's father, the 21st Phantom is revealed while he battles the greedy raiders and what that means to Kit.

Bonus feature in this issue: The Skull Cave secrets are revealed to the readers in a double-page spread.
name: Skullduggery

description: ICICLE's found herself a new friend! Or has she? Her name's Jimi Tucker, she's a research scientist at Caltech's Jet Propulsion Laboratory, and she's an old friend of Icicle's big brother, Icestar. But Jimi has a secret, and it has something do to with a certain green-haired speed-skating troublemaker who's lately been leading the police on a merry chase. You won't want to miss the debut of the newest star in our constellation of Champions, the irrepressible SKATER!

The mutants of the future finally come to understand the real sad meaning of mutantkind's past as a day trip from Utopia takes a tragic, bloody turn. In the wake of SCHISM's first casualties, can Generation Hope even exist anymore? Plus: A new light pings into existence on Cerebra - a new mutant life, in need of help before his nascent power consumes him. Can the world's newest mutant team save the world's newest mutant? Then, Generation Hope's resident wild man, Primal, is on trial, and the X-Men may lose custody. Can they get him free? Should they? And finally, Generation Hope discovers what happens when a light goes out. Collecting GENERATION HOPE #6-12.
name: Volume 2

description: Charlotte's dreams have come true: The class field trip is going to be to a famous gourmet peanut candy factory! But even before the trip starts, her peanut addiction gets her AND Tifanny in trouble! The stress of watching over Charlie triggers something in Tif's genes, and she transforms into something twice her size, twice her speed and completely out of conscious control! She recovers, but she still has to "babysit" Charlie during the trip itself. Can she control her best friend and the raging spirit that dwells within her?

volume.name: Gold Digger Tifanny & Charlotte Second Semester

description: Ms. Giggle's longtime friend, the eternally youthful rock musician Rick, invites her to a welcome-back party now that she's visiting other worlds again, but she arrives to find him and his band missing! She soon discovers Rick's been captured by his ex-girlfriend Jodie and her horde of bad ol' Puddy Tats! Ms. Giggle, Tiffy, Charlie, Erwin and Pojohead off to Jodie's fortress, only to be captured. Can they save Rick and themselves before the Puddy Tats fricassee Charlie and Pojo for lunch?

volume.name: Gold Digger Tifanny & Charlotte Second Semester

description: Legendary creator John Byrne collaborates with a host of top-tier talent to deliver a Hulk saga unlike any other. Join the Green Goliath as he journeys to the American heartland - and into his own troubled past - and encounters friend and foe alike. Featuring Iron Man and the Avengers; a shape-shifting faux Wolverine; and Greenskin's old sparring partner, the Thing! The Hulk may want to be left alone, but that ain't gonna happen with this colossal cast of characters! Collecting HULK (1999) #1-11 and ANNUAL 1999.
name: TPB

volume.name: Hulk by John Byrne and Ron Garney

description:
Gold Digger creator Fred Perry and rapidly rising fan-fave artist J.L. Anderson are about to school you in what the next generation of GD is all about!

Six-year-old Tiffany 'Gia, daughter of Earth's last were-cheetah and an alien, nano-machine-enhanced prince, is ready to start her first day of school—high school, that is. She and her bestest buddy Charlotte, a full-grown harpy with the mind of a young teen, are going to APS-001, where they and other "special" students will receive an education like no other on Earth! But will they survive their homeroom teacher's project to clone herself a husband?

Gold Digger creator Fred Perry and rapidly rising fan-fave artist J.L. Anderson are about to school you in what the next generation of GD is all about!

Six-year-old prodigy Tifanny 'Gia's really enjoying attending A.P.S.-001, the high school for the superheroes and super-scientists of the future. When her homeroom teacher, Miss Giggle, restarts the after-school exploration club, Tifanny's all set to join—until Miss Giggle mentions previous fatalities. She promises there won't be any THIS time, though!

Gold Digger creator Fred Perry and rapidly rising fan-fave artist J.L. Anderson are about to school you in what the next generation of GD is all about!

It's time for Charlotte the harpy's first driving lesson, and she and her best friend/classmate, six-year-old Tifanny 'Gia, can't wait to get started! Charlotte's "mother", Penny Pincer, would prefer to wait, but she settles for setting up a driving sim on her hydrofoil, well away from any other traffic. But what do you do when you encounter situations not covered in the driver's ed manual—like a sea monster wanting to trade lunches?

Gold Digger creator Fred Perry and rapidly rising fan-fave artist J.L. Anderson are about to school you in what the next generation of GD is all about!

Tifanny and Pojo get to reminisce about their long, happy life together—courtesy of Charlotte's imagination! On the bus ride home, her two captive, squirming listeners get to hear about how they will fall in love, from going on their first date to getting married to having their first child, "Charlotte, Jr.", then lots more babies, all with pretty, pink hair and smelling of a thousand fruit pie flavors! The thought of their potential future together leaves them speechless—or maybe it's because that chem-lab accident a few hours ago left them temporarily voiceless, unable to protest...
Issue #59
name: L'ORRORE EROTICO / TRANSFERT MENTALE

description: Threats to the Savage Land emerge from outside and within as Ka-Zar struggles to make sense of growing conflicts among his people. With a terrible famine raging across Pangea, outsiders are making plans to return. The forests burn as Pangeans strike deals with terrestrial corporations. And complicating matters is the reemergence of an ancient threat: the mysterious Ether Tribe, which has returned to punish anyone who dares deal with the outside world. Standing at the center of these myriad conflicts: one man and his tiger. Can Ka-Zar save his kingdom before it's too late? Collecting KA-ZAR (2011) #1-5.
name: TPB

description: Issue #23
name: GARA DI VITALITÀ / CONGIURA DI PALAZZO

description: Introducing Marvel's all-new, never-before-seen heroes of the 1930s! With a new evil washing over an unsuspecting New York City, the Operative, the Aviatrix, the Surgeon, the Revenant and Achilles blast through dangers from blood-soaked mob warehouses to monster-infested mansions, and fight to blow the lid off a conspiracy that could bring the nation itself to its knees! Award-winning historical-thriller novelist David Liss (BLACK PANTHER: THE MAN WITHOUT FEAR) and acclaimed artist Patrick Zircher (SPIDER-MAN NOIR) weave an edge-of-your-seat and in-continuity adventure intertwined with America's most scandalous crimes! Before the Invaders, before the Twelve - who were the Mystery Men? Collecting MYSTERY MEN #1-5.
name: Mystery Men

description: Fred Perry and your other favorite A.P. artists bring you more tidings of comfort and joy (and humor) with this year'sGold Digger Christmas Special! Reward someone (even yourself) for shoveling that snow, buying those gifts, decorating that tree, or just doing good deeds to get on Santa's "Nice" list!

Fred Perry and your other favorite A.P. artists are gearing up bring you another parcel of holiday joy! Packed full of heartwarming and hilarious tales of Yuletide shenanigans (and occasional hijinks), it's guaranteed to be more fun than wassailing—or at least less complicated—and much safer than stringing lights on the roof!

The X-Men event of the decade is right here! It's never been a more dangerous time to be a mutant. Even with their numbers at a record low, the world refuses to trust mutantkind. And after a mutant-triggered international incident, anti-mutant hatred hits new heights. Of course it's at this moment, when the mutant race most needs to stand together, that a split begins that will tear apart the very foundation of the X-Men. From superstar writer and Marvel Architect Jason Aaron and a full roster of comics' top artists, this is an X-tale that will reverberate for years to come! When the dust settles, the X-Men landscape will be irreparably changed. Collecting X-MEN: SCHISM #1-5, GENERATION HOPE #10-11 and X-MEN: REGENESIS.
name: X-Men: Schism

description: Issue #35
name: IL DIABOLICO SERVITORE / IDENTITÀ SESSUALE

description: In "Battia's Bane," a direct prequel to Dark Horse's Outlanders series, Battia sets out to retrieve the wayward Princess Kahm who went into hiding on a planet of cutthroats and thieves after rejecting her father's choice for an arranged marriage. Unfortunately, Battia runs into more adventure along the way than she's bargained for!
Issue #29
name: LA LEGGE DEL SILENZIO / IL SIGNORE DELLE FOLGORI

description: It's festival time in Edoka, and Tetsuya and Kahm are visited by a number of old friends. It's a happy, joyous reunion... except some of these people happen to be dead! Caravan Kidd's Johji Manabe brings together the whole Outlanders cast one more time, in this capstone to the series. A must-have for any Manabe maniac or Outlanders fan!
Issue #30
name: SHOCK ELETTRONICO
